translations: n．爱发牢骚的人，脾气坏的人（grouch的复数形式）
· He is always surrounded by grouches.
他总是被一群爱发牢骚的人包围。

sentences.sentence: One of his grouches is the system of payment.
sentences.translation: 他的牢骚之一是薪酬体制。

sentences.sentence: Keep this in mind if you are one of those grouches!
sentences.translation: 如果你也是一个心怀不满的人，请谨记这一条！

sentences.sentence: Keep this in mind if you are one of those grouches!
sentences.translation: 如果你就是牢骚满腹的人，那你要注意啦！
